page.title: 19Meals, Eckington Village.
page.content: {Breakfast:-}We found that the most popular drinks were tea and orange juice, only one person had grapefruit juice. The most popular cereals were Cornflakes, Wheatabix, Rice Crispies, and Frosties. The most popular spreads were honey and marmalade; the most popular cooked foods are egg and bacon. {Mid-morning Snacks:-}I found that the most popular drink was Ribena, followed by lemon and orange squash. The most popular fruit were apples. Crisps were quite popular , and a majority of people liked ice lollies. {Midday meals Monday-Friday:-}The most popular drink is orange. Most children prefered white bread to brown or wholemeal bread. More children liked ham than any other meat. Many children eat crisps, yoghurt, jam tarts, swiss roll,apples,and Penguin biscuits.
